title: Graduation Night
description: When a woman attempts to connect with old neighborhood friends on Facebook, she has no idea it will dredge up a shocking, long buried truth. Keith Morrison reports in this Dateline classic. Originally aired on NBC on April 4, 2014.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
